inclusion.criterion: smoking and obstructive disease with FEV1/FVC < 70%
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: presence of mild-to-moderate daytime hypoxemia with a daytime PaO2 in the range of 56-69 mmHg
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: patients fulfilling our definition of nocturnal oxygen desaturation: >= 30% of the recording time with transcutaneous arterial oxygen saturation < 90%
inclusion.label: met

exclusion.criterion: Patients with severe hypoxemia fulfilling the usual criteria for continuous oxygen therapy at study entry
exclusion.label: unknown

exclusion.criterion: PaO2 <=55 mmHg; or PaO2 <= 59 mmHg with clinical evidence of right ventricular hypertrophy (P pulmonale on ECG:3 mm leads ll, lll, aVf)
exclusion.label: unknown

notes: Patient has COPD and obstructive sleep apnea, but no severe hypoxemia or known left heart disease. Patient is currently using BiPap at night.
